mgmt_bridge.title: Management Network Bridge
mgmt_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the management interface of Webfilter. It is a Linux network bridge. This field can be overridden by defining the management network bridge separately in the component configuration. Defaults to the global setting

vmname.description: Name of the Virtual Machine on the Hypervisor

target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM will be instantiated

cpuset.title: KVM cpuset information
cpuset.description: Cpuset information for cpu pinning on KVM. For example, Webfilter requires 6 cores and sample values will be of the form [ 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 ]
